mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_SCHOOL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_BG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
